ai-ya5.3.5:1.1_0: One who understands suffering, its origin, not its cessation.
ai-ya5.3.5:2.1_0: And when you give up suffering, they will give up suffering.
ai-ya5.3.5:3.1_0: One who doesn’t completely understand suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path.
ai-ya5.3.5:4.1_0: they won’t give up suffering, but don’t truly know the truth of suffering.
ai-ya5.3.5:4.1_1: They don’t attend on the path leading to suffering, originating from suffering, or calming them.
ai-ya5.3.5:5.1_0: And when you don’t give up suffering, they don’t give up suffering.
ai-ya5.3.5:6.1_0: the origin of the path, the ending of suffering, but not the truth of suffering.
ai-ya5.3.5:6.1_1: They don’t attend on the path leading to origination, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape.
